author: Reuters
title: China mandates coronavirus tests for key public workers leaving Wuhan
description: The government of Hubei province, of which Wuhan is capital, will pay for the tests.
content:
China ordered on April 18 that anyone in Wuhan working in certain service-related jobs must take a coronavirus test if they want to leave the city.
The order comes after the central city, where the coronavirus emerged late last year, lifted a 70-day lockdown… [+1874 chars]
